description.text:
What does the book say?

  $(b;winter)-The magical eye contained the greatest magic know to the Feywild. After the war many wanted the eye's power and many wizards and evokers fought over it. - $()

 Wizards and Evokers...I saw an Evoker once during a raid on our forest. They often attack the Harengon villages too! We should try capture one!
